title: Tanks pretty useless with Lethality ontop of true damage
body:
Between true damage and Lethality tanks either need 10,000 health and 700 armor/MR or they just melt in 4 to 6 attacks. 
This has a massive impact on the gameplay for people who main tanks.

I realize people need a way to kill tanks but when a tank has a full build it shouldn't just die from 4 attacks.

replies.body: Lethality is not very good against tanks though.
Lethality does absolutely nothing to tanks, it is flat reduction. A full lethality build negates one armor item, at most.
